name: Magic Eggs
description: Magic Eggs (MAGA) is a crucial token in the Naga Kingdom's ecosystem, which has a powerful impact on players' faith and expectations towards the game itself. MAGA tokens are used as a means to trade and the fees to all activities in the Game, which include the fee to join Arena Mode, the conditions to expand the inventory bag and the fee to increase snake's health as it reduces to 0. Therefore, to the development team, it is of the utmost importance to boost the value of the MAGA tokens in order to build and expand the global scope of the project.
